about_the_game:
Able to have a fling with the reliable Doctor Ken at the Morningwood Hospital!

To access him:
- Wait until the Hospital appears in the second map
- Wait for around a week until he appears

Starting from there, you can give gifts and hang out with Doctor Ken like you do with the other boys!
His Heart Events ONLY trigger at NIGHT. So Hangouts in the Day Time will not lead to any events.

This DLC includes a CG Set and interactions with him in-game.

NOTE:
This does not affect your ending, but will change some dialogue in the game when you've started seeing him.

Please make sure to update to the latest version of the game to use this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains sexual actions between two men. 
Be advised of adult content and themes.

detailed_description:
Able to have a fling with the reliable Doctor Ken at the Morningwood Hospital!

To access him:
- Wait until the Hospital appears in the second map
- Wait for around a week until he appears

Starting from there, you can give gifts and hang out with Doctor Ken like you do with the other boys!
His Heart Events ONLY trigger at NIGHT. So Hangouts in the Day Time will not lead to any events.

This DLC includes a CG Set and interactions with him in-game.

NOTE:
This does not affect your ending, but will change some dialogue in the game when you've started seeing him.

Please make sure to update to the latest version of the game to use this DLC!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 9 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 9 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Disk Space is for DLC only, please check main game for full specs)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 9 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Disk Space is for DLC only, please check main game for full specs)
